#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
#define li long int
#define sf(x) scanf("%ld",&(x))
int main()
{
	li x,y,a,b,n,i,j,k,t,hcf,sum;
	sf(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sf(a);
		sf(b);
		hcf=__gcd(a,b);
		if(hcf==1||hcf==2)
		{
			cout<<"1\n";
			continue;
		}
		else
		if(hcf==3)
		{
			cout<<"2\n";
			continue;
		}
		else
		{
			x=1,y=2;
		    for(i=1;i<=hcf-3;i++)
		   {
			x=x%mod;
			y=y%mod;
			sum=(x+y)%mod;
			 x=y;
			 y=sum;
		   }
		}
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
